title: November New York Brush Lettering workshops and lecture
content:
Here are 2 excellent workshops with spaces still available as of 11-4-02...   
John Downer on signwriting and   
Carl Rohrs on brush lettering German typefaces.   
   
   
Society of Scribes presents:   
   
"An Evening with Carl Rohrs"   
Friday, November 8   
School of Visual Arts Annex   
214 East 21st Street   
6:30pm to 9:30pm   
$10 members / $15 non-members   
   
A slide lecture of German typefaces will be covered: the cross influence of   
calligraphy on type and type on calligraphy. Focusing on typefaces from all   
over Europe done mostly in the 1930â
author: cdiedwardo
